00009 #include <cstddef>
00010 #include <iostream>
00011 #include <iomanip>
00012 #include <string>
00013 #include <vector>
00014 #include <memory>
00015 #include <sys/time.h>
00016 #include "lsf/basic/singleton.hpp"

00019 // Macro defines
00020 #define LSF_TEST_RED "\e[1m\e[31m"
00021 #define LSF_TEST_GREEN "\e[1m\e[32m"
00022 #define LSF_TEST_EOC "\e[m"
00023 
00024 // run test
00025 #define LSF_TEST_ALL(argc, argv) \
00026     if (!lsf::basic::UnitTest::Instance()->Run(argc, argv)) exit(-1);
00027 
00028 // declare test case
00029 #define LSF_TEST_CASE(arg_case_name)                                                                    \
00030     class LSF_TEST_##arg_case_name : public lsf::basic::TestCase {                                      \
00031     public:                                                                                             \
00032         LSF_TEST_##arg_case_name(std::string const& case_name) : TestCase(case_name) {}                 \
00033         virtual void Run() override final;                                                              \
00034     private:                                                                                            \
00035         static lsf::basic::TestCase* const _helper;                                                     \
00036     };                                                                                                  \
00037     lsf::basic::TestCase* const LSF_TEST_##arg_case_name::_helper =                                     \
00038         lsf::basic::UnitTest::Instance()->RegisterCase(new LSF_TEST_##arg_case_name(#arg_case_name));   \
00039     void LSF_TEST_##arg_case_name::Run()
00040 
00041 // declare assert
00042 #define LSF_ASSERT(expr)                                                                                         \
00043     do {                                                                                                         \
00044         if (expr)                                                                                                \
00045             std::cout << LSF_TEST_GREEN << "[  Passed  ] " << LSF_TEST_EOC << __FILE__ << "|" << __LINE__ << " " \
00046                       << #expr << std::endl;                                                                     \
00047         else {                                                                                                   \
00048             std::cout << LSF_TEST_RED << "[  Failed  ] " << LSF_TEST_EOC << __FILE__ << "|" << __LINE__ << " "   \
00049                       << #expr << std::endl;                                                                     \
00050             lsf::basic::UnitTest::Instance()->SetFail();                                                         \
00051         }                                                                                                        \
00052     } while (0)
00053 
00054 #define LSF_ASSERT_EXIT(expr)                                                                                    \
00055     do {                                                                                                         \
00056         if (expr)                                                                                                \
00057             std::cout << LSF_TEST_GREEN << "[  Passed  ] " << LSF_TEST_EOC << __FILE__ << "|" << __LINE__ << " " \
00058                       << #expr << std::endl;                                                                     \
00059         else {                                                                                                   \
00060             std::cout << LSF_TEST_RED << "[  Failed  ] " << LSF_TEST_EOC << __FILE__ << "|" << __LINE__ << " "   \
00061                       << #expr << std::endl;                                                                     \
00062             lsf::basic::UnitTest::Instance()->SetFail();                                                         \
00063             exit(-1);                                                                                            \
00064         }                                                                                                        \
00065     } while (0)
00066 
00067 #define LSF_ASSERT_ERR_ONLY(expr)                                                                              \
00068     do {                                                                                                       \
00069         if (!(expr)) {                                                                                         \
00070             std::cout << LSF_TEST_RED << "[  Failed  ] " << LSF_TEST_EOC << __FILE__ << "|" << __LINE__ << " " \
00071                       << #expr << std::endl;                                                                   \
00072             lsf::basic::UnitTest::Instance()->SetFail();                                                       \
00073         }                                                                                                      \
00074     } while (0)
00075 
00076 #define LSF_ASSERT_EXIT_ERR_ONLY(expr)                                                                         \
00077     do {                                                                                                       \
00078         if (!(expr)) {                                                                                         \
00079             std::cout << LSF_TEST_RED << "[  Failed  ] " << LSF_TEST_EOC << __FILE__ << "|" << __LINE__ << " " \
00080                       << #expr << std::endl;                                                                   \
00081             lsf::basic::UnitTest::Instance()->SetFail();                                                       \
00082             exit(-1);                                                                                          \
00083         }                                                                                                      \
00084     } while (0)
00085 
00086 namespace lsf {
00087 namespace basic {
00088 
00090 // TestCase
00091 class TestCase {
00092 public:
00093     TestCase(std::string const& case_name) : _case_name(case_name) {}
00094     virtual ~TestCase() {}
00095 
00096     virtual void Run() = 0;
00097 
00098     std::string const& CaseName() const { return _case_name; }
00099 
00100 protected:
00101     std::string _case_name;
00102 };
00103 
00105 // UnitTest
00106 class UnitTest : public lsf::basic::Singleton<UnitTest> {
00107 public:
00108     using container_type = std::vector<std::unique_ptr<TestCase>>;
00109     using const_iterator = container_type::const_iterator;
00110     using iterator = container_type::iterator;
00111 
00112 public:
00113     TestCase* RegisterCase(TestCase* ptr_test_case) {
00114         _case_list.push_back(container_type::value_type(ptr_test_case));
00115         return ptr_test_case;
00116     }
00117 
00118     bool Run(int argc, char** argv) {
00119         size_t passed_num = 0;
00120         size_t failed_num = 0;
00121         size_t cnt = 1;
00122         bool result = true;
00123         timeval tv_begin, tv_end;
00124 
00125         // top delimit
00126         std::cout << LSF_TEST_GREEN << "============================================================" << LSF_TEST_EOC
00127                   << std::endl;
00128         std::cout << LSF_TEST_GREEN << "Start Testing " << argv[0] << LSF_TEST_EOC << std::endl;
00129         std::cout << LSF_TEST_GREEN << "============================================================" << LSF_TEST_EOC
00130                   << std::endl;
00131 
00132         // unit test content
00133         gettimeofday(&tv_begin, nullptr);
00134         for (auto const&  pcase : _case_list) {
00135             _test_case_result = true;
00136 
00137             timeval case_begin, case_end;
00138 
00139             std::cout << LSF_TEST_GREEN << "[ Test " << std::setw(3) << std::setfill('0') << cnt << " ] "
00140                       << pcase->CaseName() << LSF_TEST_EOC << std::endl;
00141 
00142             gettimeofday(&case_begin, nullptr);
00143 
00144             pcase->Run();
00145 
00146             gettimeofday(&case_end, nullptr);
00147 
00148             uint64_t milli_sec = (case_end.tv_sec * 1000 + case_end.tv_usec / 1000) -
00149                                  (case_begin.tv_sec * 1000 + case_begin.tv_usec / 1000);
00150 
00151             if (_test_case_result) {
00152                 std::cout << LSF_TEST_GREEN << "[  Result  ] Passed" << LSF_TEST_EOC << std::endl;
00153                 std::cout << LSF_TEST_GREEN << "[   Time   ] " << milli_sec / 1000 << "." << milli_sec % 1000
00154                           << LSF_TEST_EOC << std::endl;
00155                 passed_num++;
00156             } else {
00157                 std::cout << LSF_TEST_RED << "[  Result  ] Failed" << LSF_TEST_EOC << std::endl;
00158                 std::cout << LSF_TEST_RED << "[   Time   ] " << milli_sec / 1000 << "." << milli_sec % 1000
00159                           << LSF_TEST_EOC << std::endl;
00160                 failed_num++;
00161                 result = false;
00162             }
00163         }
00164         gettimeofday(&tv_end, nullptr);
00165 
00166         // middle delimit
00167         uint64_t milli_sec =
00168             (tv_end.tv_sec * 1000 + tv_end.tv_usec / 1000) - (tv_begin.tv_sec * 1000 + tv_begin.tv_usec / 1000);
00169 
00170         // unit test statics
00171         std::cout << LSF_TEST_GREEN << "============================================================" << LSF_TEST_EOC
00172                   << std::endl;
00173         std::cout << LSF_TEST_GREEN << "Total TestCase: " << passed_num + failed_num << LSF_TEST_EOC << std::endl;
00174         std::cout << LSF_TEST_GREEN << "Total Time: " << milli_sec / 1000 << "." << milli_sec % 1000 << LSF_TEST_EOC
00175                   << std::endl;
00176         std::cout << LSF_TEST_GREEN << "Total Passed: " << passed_num << LSF_TEST_EOC << std::endl;
00177         std::cout << LSF_TEST_RED << "Total Failed: " << failed_num << LSF_TEST_EOC << std::endl;
00178 
00179         return result;
00180     }
00181 
00182     void SetFail() { _test_case_result = false; }
00183 
00184 private:
00185     container_type _case_list;
00186     bool _test_case_result = true;
00187 };
00188 
00189 }  // end of namespace basic
00190 }  // end of namespace lsf
